title: Game Initialization
description: Verify that the game initializes correctly displaying an empty game board, default score (0), level (1), and game status as 'ready'.

steps.description: Open the K-Tetris Seoul web app in a supported browser.
Confirm the game board is rendered empty with no active tetrominoes.
Verify initial score is displayed as 0.
Verify initial level is displayed as 1.
Verify game status shows 'ready' or initial starting state.

title: Tetromino Spawn and Movement
description: Verify that a new tetromino spawns at the top-center of the board and can be moved left, right, and down correctly with keyboard controls.

steps.description: Start a new game or resume from the initial state.
Confirm a tetromino piece appears at the top-center of the game board.
Use left arrow key to move the piece left.
Check that the tetromino moves one cell to the left without crossing left boundary.
Use right arrow key to move the piece right.
Check that the tetromino moves one cell to the right without crossing right boundary.
Use down arrow key to move the piece down.
Check that the tetromino moves one cell down.

title: Tetromino Rotation Mechanics
description: Verify that the tetromino rotates correctly clockwise with keyboard input without clipping into other blocks or walls.

steps.description: Start a new game and let a tetromino spawn.
Press the rotate key (typically up arrow or 'X' key).
Verify the tetromino rotates correctly in a clockwise direction.
Ensure the rotated piece does not overlap existing locked blocks or go beyond game board boundaries.

title: Soft Drop and Hard Drop Functionality
description: Verify soft drop (increase descent speed) and hard drop (instantly drop tetromino to bottom) controls work correctly.

steps.description: Start a new game with an active tetromino.
Press and hold the down arrow key (soft drop).
Verify that the tetromino descends faster than normal.
Press the hard drop key (usually spacebar).
Verify the tetromino instantly drops and locks at the bottom or on top of existing blocks.

title: Collision Detection and Locking
description: Verify that tetrominoes lock correctly upon collision with the bottom or other locked pieces and a new piece spawns.

steps.description: Let a tetromino fall to bottom or onto existing blocks.
Confirm the tetromino locks in place upon collision.
Verify a new tetromino spawns at the top-center of the board.

title: Line Clearing and Score Update
description: Validate that completed horizontal lines are cleared from the game board, score and level update correctly.

steps.description: Arrange tetrominoes to complete at least one full horizontal line.
Verify the completed line(s) are cleared from the board.
Confirm score is updated according to number of lines cleared.
Verify level is incremented appropriately when reaching score thresholds.

title: Game Over Condition
description: Verify the game detects loss condition when new tetromino cannot spawn and displays game-over screen/state.

steps.description: Fill the game board up to the top with locked tetrominoes.
Attempt to spawn a new tetromino.
Verify that the game detects the loss condition and displays the game over state.

title: Responsive Canvas Rendering
description: Confirm the game board canvas renders correctly and scales appropriately on different screen sizes and resolutions.

steps.description: Open the game on desktop at various screen resolutions.
Verify the game board scales appropriately without distortion or clipping.
Open the game on mobile browsers with varying screen sizes.
Confirm the canvas game board is fully visible, correctly proportioned, and responsive.

title: Audio Playback and Controls
description: Verify background music plays continuously and sound effects trigger on game events with controllable volume.

steps.description: Start a new game and allow gameplay to begin.
Verify background music starts playing automatically or on user action.
Trigger game events such as line clear and tetromino lock.
Confirm appropriate sound effects play synchronously with these events.
Adjust volume controls using UI or keyboard.
Verify audio volume changes accordingly without distortion or interruption.

title: Keyboard Input Responsiveness and Edge Cases
description: Ensure keyboard inputs respond immediately and handle edge cases such as repeated rapid key presses and invalid keys.

steps.description: Rapidly press arrow keys for movement and rotation repeatedly.
Verify the game processes inputs smoothly without lag or missed actions.
Press keys that are not bound to any game action (e.g. alphabet keys).
Confirm no unwanted actions or errors occur.
Simultaneously press multiple control keys.
Verify correct prioritized handling of simultaneous inputs.

title: Game State Persistence on Pause and Resume
description: Verify that game state (score, level, board, active piece) persists correctly when game is paused and resumed.

steps.description: Start gameplay and achieve some progress (some pieces locked, score/level updated).
Activate pause functionality.
Confirm gameplay halts and UI indicates paused state.
Resume gameplay.
Verify game state including score, level, locked pieces and active tetromino remain unchanged except time progress.

title: Performance Under Extended Gameplay
description: Verify there is no performance degradation or crashes during extended play session across different browsers.

steps.description: Play the game continuously for at least 30 minutes or until level 10+ is reached.
Confirm consistent frame rate and responsive controls throughout.
Verify no crashes, freezes, or memory leaks occur.
Repeat test on Chrome, Firefox, and Edge browsers.
Verify consistent performance and no browser-specific issues.
